nde2.methodcalls.discovery

Class GetAreaChildrenMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
      • nde2.methodcalls.discovery.BaseMethodCall
        • nde2.methodcalls.discovery.GetAreaChildrenMethodCall

  • public class GetAreaChildrenMethodCall
extends BaseMethodCall
    Encapsulates the GetAreaChildren() call to the NDE2 web service. Creation follows the Builder pattern.

    This operation allows you to get the lower level areas for a supplied area, regardless of level type. Only those areas immediately below the supplied area are returned. For example, the child areas of a region would be the counties and unitary authorities within that region. Repeatedly calling this operation allows you drill down through area hierarchies.

    Author:
    filip

        This method will take data supplied to this GetAreaChildrenMethodCall and call the web service. It will then parse the result, or thrown an Exception if there is a problem.
